plot: When a pirate version of the most popular - first person shooter (FPS) video game i.e., Call of Duty - lands in the hands of Matt and Jimmy, they immediately think it's the coolest video game they have ever played. Little do they know that what seems to be their favorite video game is actually an evil recruiting device to turn selected kids into real Time Warriors, at the service of "The Lord of War": an evil character behind every war since the beginning of time.
title: Time Warrior
